website_summaries.verdict: This attractive, leather-style triple charger protects your  devices from overcurrent. It also, however, seriously heats up the back of your phone.
pros: Includes the station, micro USB cable, and AC adapter
Keeps device completely safe from overcurrent
Can answer the phone while charging
Wide, flat charger helps keep phone from getting knocked off
cons: Does not charge through metal or cases thicker than 4mm
Tends to heat up the back of the phone

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Product has the perfect size and it charges even With heavy covers on phones, love the Charging station.
customer_reviews.author: baron

customer_reviews.title: FAST!
customer_reviews.text: This charger is so fast! It's a great addition to our charging station and now I don't have to worry if I have enough cords for everyone. Even my non-techie husband loves it. Works grat on husband's phone with the case, I have to remove mine because it has magnets. I like this charger so much I ordered a new case. Great customer service!! We had a problem after using the charger for 4 months. They immediately addressed the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K

customer_reviews.title: Greatly simplifies the charging process and looks great
customer_reviews.text: This has replaced the cable hydra that has been haunting my desk. It's removed the hassle of ensuring that I have the correct working cable for each device I own. As with all wireless chargers, you need to place the device centered on the ring. On this charger it's indicated by a stamped ring pattern. With practice, this becomes automatic. If your phone/device doesn't come with wireless charging, there are aftermarket add-ons that are little more than a sticker with wires. I'm using a converter on my Pixel with no problems other than it blocking the USB port when I want to d/l pictures to my computer.
customer_reviews.author: 3illed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent charger....
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent charger. It works and charges at a normal speed. The only issue I had depends on the case you use for the phone. If you are using the standard silicone cases most people use you should be fine. If you use an OutterBox or similar case you have to find the sweet spot to charge. I have circumvented this by laying my phone horizontally instead of vertically. Other than that this thing has charged my phone to 100% every time.
customer_reviews.author: James Payne

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because of the price and appearance. It works wonderful. We had problems with wireless charging because my hubby uses a heavy duty case. No problems here. Charges great and is fast too. Would definitely recommend. We have 2 LG v40 thinq phones and will charge our daughter's Apple too.
customer_reviews.author: Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Great for charging multiple devices at the same time!
customer_reviews.text: The product came quickly as usual. Set up was as easy as plugging it in. We have teenagers, and keeping a charging cord is always a challenge. They disappear a fast as we can buy them! So, I decided to try this charging pad to see if we could make life easier. AND IT DOES!! It hold three devices. It is a simple as laying the device on the pad. You do have to pay attention when you lay it down, and make sure you have it in the right position. All that involves is looking at your phone and making sure the charging screen comes up. It is a GREAT product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia H

customer_reviews.title: Sad/ Happy  now
customer_reviews.text: It made really cheap. It was hard to place in the plug with the hole. The plastic looked like it was going to rip. It dose work. If you have 3 phone on it it takes a while for it to charge all three phone than one at a time. I not sure if it has to do with the type of phones. All three are different phones.we went on vacation and it stopped working . I sent the other one back. They make it so easy for me thru Koles . My new one work lot better. I'm very happy now.!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Kimlinger

customer_reviews.title: 3 iPhones charging...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this to put by our phone in the kitchen to simultaneously charge all 3 of our iPhones (one X and two 8s). It works like a charm! It's thin and not cheaply made. Even the power cord's "brick" that plugs into the outlet is a significant size to deliver the power to the 3 coils. The leather(?) surface is awesome. Looks like it's high quality. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good basic wireless charger that does the job.
customer_reviews.text: You get exactly what the description provides, a product that is certified, safe, and will not damage your phone. I have been using it with my Samsung Galaxy Note 8 and two Sony Xperia XZ3 phones without any issue. Overcharge protection kicks in also when my phones are fully charged. It charges a little slow, but that is intended use and for safety.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph V. Lieu

customer_reviews.title: Nightstand Charger
customer_reviews.text: Great charger for your nightstand. Just toss it on and 90% of the time it’ll land right on a charging coil without minor adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Nice charging pad
customer_reviews.text: Nice charging pad. No issues like the material as it prevents your phone sliding around if it vibrates.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Russell

customer_reviews.title: No clue yet...need correct adapter!
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept and product for the most part. We just got 3 iPhone XRs so this seemed like a perfect fit/purchase. However, we didn’t receive the correct adapter! I haven’t been able to or can’t use it yet! The adapter has 2 pin type prongs that seems like its to be plugged in a Chinese wall outlet! I need the right plug/adapter!!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Marioth

customer_reviews.title: Claims are unfounded. Does not work as intended.
customer_reviews.text: I unboxed this product to discover that the plug provided is european and not american. I had to purchase a separate plug for this product to work. Then the product does not actually charge the phone as there is no indication on the charge bar that it is being charged. I will return and not buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too difficult to position a phone for charging.
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this product, but it isn't easy to use with my Pixel 3XL. Ny problem is that to make it charge, it takes way too much time perfectly positioning the phone to start charging. I have to sit it on the circle and scoot it around slightly in multiple directions until it is perfectly positioned and starts charging. Now I've made the mistake a few times of just sitting it down to charge without being meticulous, and then I have a dead phone the next day because it never charged. I'm just going to go back to my old plug-in charger because it takes less time and has less risk of bumping it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works perfectly, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Is working perfectly, I have used it to charge 3 phones at the same time, phones charge very fast. I have also AirPods + phones, and everything charges perfectly. The size is very good, it fits 3 phones perfectly, any smaller and they would not fit. Temperature while charging is excellent, no phone has overheated, nor the charging pad has overheated. I was hesitant about buying this becaus of the reviews, but this is actually a great product, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Luis Vidal

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last pass 3 months
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our family of four that all have iPhones and this works great we put them to charge and no worry about over charging or damaging our phones or battery life. It’s light weight and perfect to just place any where. Not bulky or big like some other ones. Update it’s now 3 months later and only one spot on the charging pad works well some what you place the phone and a few minutes later it connects and then disconnnects. Guess it’s not that great I wouldn’t recommend this. It didn’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: k.padil

customer_reviews.title: Need to place accurately
customer_reviews.text: 1. No visual indication ( like light or anything ) Indicating charging started . I know it’s ultra thin so maybe led or light is not possible 2. Need to place the phone accurately within MM limits to get charging started . Off by few Cms no charging 3. I am returning this and will research more to find ultra slim, with over charge protection and with led light
customer_reviews.author: bay

customer_reviews.title: This does not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This item does not work as described. First the charging is so slow when it charges at all. Much slower than corded charging- my phone increased in charge at a rate of 2% per hour. Second, it keeps flipping from charging to not charging while the phone and the pad are completely stationary and untouched. It does not work- spend the money and buy a better one
customer_reviews.author: Oi812

customer_reviews.title: Really nice charging pad
customer_reviews.text: Looks really great. We use it in the communal area of the home where everyone can put down their phones and have them charge while doing activities together. It works well and charges phones reasonably quickly. The coils are marked out which helps with being able to position the phone over the coils. The look is very nice - it's plether of course but it gives the product a more refined look and looks better than other QI charges which are boring plastic & spaceship leds.
customer_reviews.author: Parth Pancholi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this charger in November 2019 and it worked great, exactly as advertised! Really like how thin it is which makes it really practical for travel. Then 2 weeks ago, the unit suddenly stopped working. I contacted ZealSound customer services by email to explain the situation. ZealSound was quite surprised that the unit failed since they expect that "there should be 1% defective rate". So they immediately offered to send me a replacement unit after I provided them with the Amazon order info - I expect to receive the replacement in a few days. I am impressed with this outstanding customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Tim K.

customer_reviews.title: All black and sleep friendly
customer_reviews.text: This Qi charger is perfect for the bedroom! It has NO lights or LEDs to emmet any light. The black faux-leather material is inoffensive and neutral. All three charge areas are essentially the same and charge up to 5W wirelessly. I use it with my phone and wireless earphones. I had deducted a star because they indented their brand name, ZealSound, four different places on the surface! Thanks, but keep it clean and if you must, print your logo once, in the corner. Yeesh!
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: SO handy
customer_reviews.text: We had another one of these that was great but the cord stopped working about 4 months in. I was so excited about this one, seems much more sturdy (the port area which was what stopped working on our other one) and it's much larger so it's easier to place your phone on. Doesn't work with my case on but I think if you had a slimmer one it would, also works with AirPod cases and our last one didn't so all around very happy!
customer_reviews.author: avdescam

customer_reviews.title: Works well but phone positioning is key
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy little item to have on the dresser. You put your phone down, and it charges. Pretty basic. I’m not sure why the review is asking me about how heavy it is, because I don’t really lift it up much. I don’t think that’s really how you use it. But for basic charging, it does the job. One note though, you do have to get your phone in just the right spot because sometimes you’ll wake up in the morning and it won’t have charged. That’s more my fault than the devices fault but just fair warning.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisInDiego

customer_reviews.title: Works for 3 devices
customer_reviews.text: This wireless charger is a sleek design that allows it to fit seamlessly on my night stand for a minimalist look. It allows wireless charging for up to 3 supported devices and comes with an AC adapter. It works well with my plastic case on the phone both Apple and Android devices. This does not charge as fast as another charger I bought, but it allows more devices and is thinner and good for use on a night stand.
customer_reviews.author: Siva S

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste ur time
customer_reviews.text: This thing does not work atall on 5 phones I have in my house hold none of them charged or did anything
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works if properly used!!
customer_reviews.text: It charges multiple devices which is good but phone needs to be placed right at the exact spot for it to be charged. Little here and there and it wont charge. Charging Pad is covered with some black flimsy thick paper kinda material and can scratch. It is not plastic or glass. Device is light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Urmila

customer_reviews.title: Great charger, plus I love the flat, elegant design
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive wireless charger, and it charges great when my phone case is off. I like the slim leather look and the way I can just lay my phone on top to charge. So handy! It does take a couple episodes of trial and error to get my phone to start charging with its case on, but since I hate taking the case off, I just move it around till the charging finally kicks in.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Martin

customer_reviews.title: Went dead in less than 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item in November for my boyfriend as a Christmas present and it already went dead about three weeks ago. His phone was super hot in the morning and it had not charged and he discovered that it was no longer working. I have one I bought a few weeks earlier for myself that is still working, but I’m waiting for it to quit. Too bad because it’s nice and light and doesn’t have an annoying light, so you can have it by the bedside.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how simple and easy it is to use this. Honestly, it’s a something I use everyday now, which I totally didn’t expect to use before but now it’s become a part of daily life. I keep it on my desk where I charge my devices. It’s sleek, the delivery was fast, in spite of the delays in shipping these days and overall I’m very satisfied with my purchase! I would highly recommend this to anybody who’s interesting in purchasing this item as I think the price is reasonable and the overall design is sleek and stylish. A great accessory in anyone’s work station or just to keep around at home!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hou

customer_reviews.title: Works well with all my phones
customer_reviews.text: I particularly like the design so it actually looks nice on my desk or living room. It generous in size so you can have multiple devices charging at once. I like it also so my whole family can charge all at once while sleeping. One ac plug save outlet space as well. This charging pad is slim and looks nice. Overall, very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jor El

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It only worked for about a week. Very poor quality. The cord came loose with normal use. Do not buy it. Spend a little more and get better quality.
customer_reviews.author: TracyLynn Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Speed and go.
customer_reviews.text: Depending on the type of case you have, this charging station works well with life. As the on to go person, having to connect to wires can be annoying. This is a good upgrade for when you need speed and go service at home. No dents or disappointments when I opened this charging mat from its box. Permanently placed in the living room because what guest should be deprived of this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Benedicto Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I like the product overall but the one thing I dislike is leather. I think it would have been better to use rubber for better grip on the counter and better protection. The leather is already either fake or just low quality so rubber seems like a step up like some of the other wireless charging devices. It does what it’s supposed to though and is nice to have one in your house.
customer_reviews.author: Angus

customer_reviews.title: Learned something, not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I ended up sending this back. It wasn't want I thought it would be. Thought you could lay anything down to charge, but it has limitations. Your phone needs to be out of a cover to charge on these pads and I didn't know that. Huge pain to take it in and out every time I charge so I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Darla Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works great to charge our I phones. Kids constantly run off with my regular charger, teens take them to friends houses and I feel like I’m constantly replacing them. This is the perfect solution for a stationary charger that’s always there when I need it. Only thing is sometimes it takes a bit to adjust it on the pad to get it to connect but that may be due to my case. Otherwise, great!
customer_reviews.author: A. L.

customer_reviews.title: Pad dont work...
customer_reviews.text: You would think for a three phone charging pad that it would at least charge one phone it barely charges One phone most of the time it doesn't even charge any phone. We've tried multiple phones. For how much it cost you would think this product would actually work. What a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Norris

customer_reviews.title: Great charging wireless pad
customer_reviews.text: I picked up this wireless charger. Packaging and design is nice and clean. I really like the charging pads circles so you know exactly where you should put your phone or air pods. Product works well, and it doesn’t take too much space. I wish they could maybe add some type of layer on top so it doesn’t just look like plastic. It could make the product seem like it’s higher quality other than that, it charges my phone quickly. Overall, it isn't bad for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Good for family
customer_reviews.text: My family uses this charger daily. If you have a thin case, the charge will go through w/o needing to take off the case (HUGE PLUS!). If your phone isn't on the pad just right then sometimes it will stop and start the charge over and over. We just make sure we put the phones in the right spot to fix this. Less cables in the kitchen and less clutter. No issues with the product and we've been using for 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Evan P

customer_reviews.title: Premium feel!
customer_reviews.text: When purchasing this item I expected the housing to be a cheap plastic but after I received it, it was a very nice soft leather like material. The feel you get with premium products expensive big brand products. This rivals anything I have seen in big box stores. We leave it on our kitchen counter top and when we have guests or my Wife forgets to charge the night before, they just toss it up there for a while. I was also surprised that even with a wallet case for my phone, this still penetrated and charged. Overall great buy
customer_reviews.author: L-Padrick

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few wireless charging stations and most of the lower priced ones I have gotten what I have paid for. They charge really slow. This wireless charging station is different. I charges much faster than most of the wireless chargers I have seen, also having 3 spots for charging is very convient. I can have both my phone and AirPods charging at the same time. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Cgrayst1

customer_reviews.title: Decent, phones sometime have a hard time connecting
customer_reviews.text: Decent, phones sometime have a hard time connecting and disconnect in the middle of the night repeatedly waking me with their chirps. Sometimes my phones are at 30% in the morning, sometimes 100% and there is no way of knowing what kind of charging night it will be.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Great charger!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this charger has 3 ports to change iPhones and airpods. It’s convenient and looks high quality. I like that the charger is completely flat because it is unobtrusive. The raised circle design helps you know where to put your device.
customer_reviews.author: Jj

customer_reviews.title: Great unit and Great price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this charging pad for my teenagers. I put it in my living room area because when the kids are watching TV they always had phones plugged up everywhere around the room. Now they can charge 3 phones at once on the pad !! It’s flat and black so you barely notice it when not in use. I will also be encouraging my guest who come over to use it as well. I find that sometimes friends and family have phones that need a quick charging when they come over too. We are happy with this product and the price is very nicd!
customer_reviews.author: LBoogie

customer_reviews.title: Good charger, but a little tricky
customer_reviews.text: I like that the charger lies flat and can charge multiple devices. I wish it were a fast charger. There have been occasions when I thought my phone was placed correctly (it showed that it was charging), but in the morning, my phone dead or almost dead because it was a little off.
customer_reviews.author: m&m

customer_reviews.title: Great once you find the "sweet spot"
customer_reviews.text: This wireless charger almost charges everything except for my apple and Samsung watches. I dont like that I have to fiddle to find the "sweet spot" for my items to charge especially at night if or when my phone rings and I'm returning my device to the charger. Other than that it does the job intended
customer_reviews.author: Daiwan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: I must say I did not expect such a good quality charger for that price, it is really amazing and charges all my devices overnight, it is pretty fast although not super-fast so it's not for getting another 20% mid-day. I am very satisfied with this product and would definitely recommend to get when shopping for a multi-device wireless charger.
customer_reviews.author: Mordechai Gruber

customer_reviews.title: Devices get too hot!
customer_reviews.text: After using the device for about 1 month I noticed my phone and AirPods 2 would get extremely hot. Today when I went to take my AirPods off I dropped them because they were to the point in almost burned my hand... my AirPods will not work now have to get them replaced... I have tried my devices on another pad I have and they never got this hot!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for Pixel 4XL or iPhone X.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one pad and put an iPhone X and a Pixel 4 XL to charge and it didn't. So I returned it thinking it was defective and has Amazon send me a replacement. Replacement came and it didn't work either. It may work for other phone but didn't work for ours.
customer_reviews.author: Peter B.

customer_reviews.title: Fits well in any environment!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my new apartment for all our phones to charge and this works like a charm. the top is made of some sort of faux leather it seems like and overall i've had no issues so far. It's a little slow of a charger but it's perfect for when you leave your phone on the counter and come back to a charged phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Brian

customer_reviews.title: Love the convenience
customer_reviews.text: This is the first wireless charger I’ve ever owned and it works really well. The only issue I have is that I have to take my case/ magnet for my car holder off for it to work. It charges fine with a case but won’t charge with that magnet.
customer_reviews.author: Barry S. Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: I am returning my charging pad because it arrived in non-functional condition. I plugged it in, put my iphone 11 on it, and it didn't charge. Changed plugs, same deal. I suggest looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great Option for Wireless Charger
customer_reviews.text: So we recently bought 2 iPhone XS Max and the iPhone X for our daughter. We use the charging pad by our front door for a family charging station. Drop your phones for family time. It’s also great for visitors that need a quick boost while visiting, even with android devices. We find it was a great addition and we were able to eliminate a lot of cords.
customer_reviews.author: Keni

customer_reviews.title: Not that effective
customer_reviews.text: The concept is nice, it’s thin but the problem is I had to move my phone multiple times to get it to charge. Kind of annoying, I want to just be able to lay it down and not worry about if it’s charging or not
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and fast
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. Easy to set up and use! Works with my Samsung galaxy note 20 ultra, my boyfriends Samsung S20, and my moms iPhone8. It did not work for my moto Z3 but I upgraded phones anyways. Love that it has a lifetime warranty and was super easy to get set up. Customer service has been amazing and super friendly. I love being able to just throw my phone down and its charging, and super fast! Will be getting another for in the car.
customer_reviews.author: SAMANTHA B

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what you need it to do. I'm able to charge my cell phone through the case without any issues. It charges pretty fast as well. One thing I noticed it didn't say in the description of the item was "Fast Charging" but it seems to fast charge in my opinion. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Andre Porter

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do what I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: This could be my fault, but I bought this to charge my iPhone XS, which it does with the case on. However, I wanted it to charge my new Apple EarPods too and it doesn't do that. I can't really make use of this for just my one phone, so I'm going to return it. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Product does not work
customer_reviews.text: This product does not charge my Apple iPhone X. It connects and looks like it’s charging, but 8 hrs later my battery is at the same level or less. Also you have to take off a simple flimsy phone cover every time to place on the charger. Again, even while doing that, it does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this
customer_reviews.text: I was needing a third charger station for my work phone. I like this one better than my old. It has a nicer leather finish and it does. It have the charging light on it that keeps me up at night.
customer_reviews.author: NCGaston

customer_reviews.title: Get Away from the plug-ins
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea of a wireless charger. Works better than plugging your phone in. Throughout the day, just lay it on top and it will charge. Once you use it, you won't go back to a plug-in.
customer_reviews.author: Beryl Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: I have a work and personal mobile so I always need two chargers. With this slim wireless pad, it takes up less space, is great quality and does exactly what I need. No more cords to worry about. I love it by my bedside.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent charging station for multiple devices!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this wireless charger because of price & ability to charge 3 devices at the same time. It’s perfect for me. it’s leather-like and doesn’t scratch or even make a noise when i set my iphone on it. I use it at my desk while working and everything is always charged up whenever i need them. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great concepts
customer_reviews.text: I use my charge pad every day keep it in the living room so.if I'm not on the phone or when the kids are actually watching t.v. they dont have to worry about there I phone battery losing power so quick
customer_reviews.author: Matthew w.

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas thinking this would be great for us at night to charge our phones. Unfortunately there have been many nights that it doesn’t seem to charge. Even though we make sure we hear the beep that it connects and we see the light that it looks like it’s charging. I have woken to a dead phone a few mornings. Then it’s now hoping it will charge in the car on the way to work. I think it’s going to be going back to regular charging for us. And just take a loss on the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Bates

customer_reviews.title: Only lasts a few months.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea... convenient for personal and work phones... but is completely useless 8 months later. Purchased in January 2019, it is now August, and it's trash. No more power. The other con is it's annoying trying to find the perfect sweet spot to get the phones to charge.
customer_reviews.author: A. N.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have had this charger for about a week and everything works fine. I am charging the Samsung S7 quickly. I like the charger is very flat and looks great on the bedside table. I just put the phone or my wife on the charger, that's it. Wireless charging is easier because you don't have to worry about plugging and unplugging the phone, especially if you are already in bed and have to check the message. Play a few games, or whatever. I highly recommend this charger. With a one-year warranty, I feel that it is guaranteed, just in case it happens on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Burnet

customer_reviews.title: Good value .... good function... good quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this with both an iPhone XR and an iPhone XS Max (both have covers) and i got to say that this works great. Charges my phone pretty quick and is a great addition to add next to the bed. Now my wife and I don't have to argue over who charges their phone first. The design is very sleek and modern and goes well with anything. Good quality as well. My favorite part is that there is no annoying light that bugs in the night. Easy plug & play. So far of all the phone cases that we have and tried, they work well with this charger. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Simple

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in a day
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my port on my phone is wonky, so it doesn't charge quite right. This worked great last night and NOW it stopped. So now I'm at 28% battery and twisting a damn wire to charge my phone. I'm returning for a 2nd one and will review that one too if it stops working.
customer_reviews.author: Christine E Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this charging station several months ago to place in the kitchen so family members/guests had a convenient spot to charge their devices. So far...so good. We only use Apple phones & accessories, but, it has worked great for us so far. I did read some of the reviews with complaints of having to center a device over each charging spot, but, really hasn't been an issue for us. We just drop it on, make sure it's charging and walk away.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Brown

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless charging pad on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best wireless charging mat / charging pad by far! I have been looking around for awhile. Many are just cheap and you need to use chargers and special cables to get anything to work correctly. Everything comes in the box with this. And it works flawlessly
customer_reviews.author: rhcp011235

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice, but you have to find the perfect placement or your item will not charge. It also repeatedly starts and stops charging items without touching it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Big pad for lots of phones
customer_reviews.text: By far this is the best charging pad we have. It’s huge and fits all our phones easily and charges with the case. One of the things I hate is putting a phone on a pad and finding out in the morning that the phone wasn’t on the charging portion. No issues with this Pad!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mariko Shakespeare

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Great value, ability to charge 3 devices at once with only one outlet. Easy to take when traveling and not needing multiple cords. Only tiny issue is phone must be positioned precisely over circles to charge. If bumped at all it will lose the charging connection.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t charge Apple Watch
customer_reviews.text: The concept of this charging station is great, I liked that it was thin and was able to do three devices. Unfortunately that description did not state that Apple Watch was not compatible. It says it will charge 3 Qi devices and that is not accurate. Charged my phone and AirPods but not my Apple Watch so I returned it as I was looking for a charger that does all three devices.
customer_reviews.author: Tina F.

customer_reviews.title: Less than 5 months and no longer works
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product on May 4, 2020. Stopped working on October 2nd, 2020. Didn’t even make it 5 months. Worked well for the few months we had. Really disappointed it just stopped working out of the blue.
customer_reviews.author: Peace

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Stop working after 3 weeks... and right back it goes!
customer_reviews.author: Lio Faamasino

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after 2 months!!
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this when we first got it but it stopped working all of a sudden! Bought on August 7, 2020 and it stopped working on October 11, 2020. So lifespan is only 2 months. Not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: cdf

customer_reviews.title: Best charger for multiple phone family
customer_reviews.text: I love this charger! It makes it so much easier to just place the phones down and have them charge than having to fight to open the charging port. It fast charges our two s9 and a s7 all at the same time. I love that it is compatible with cases on the phones. I have had no problems with this charger and am considering buying a second for the living room!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffaney Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Did not charge
customer_reviews.text: Tried this with my Samsung tablet and my Motorola phone. Did not charge either of them. Returned for credit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer,   Lewjayjr.

customer_reviews.title: nice gadget for multiple phones
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this charger. Very simplistic. Just have to make sure you place the device on the right spots, so it will charge. Also nice you can charge 3 devices at once.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Works great for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this charging pad because I wanted something that looks nice to keep by my bed and charge by phone and wireless earbuds overnight. I didn't expect a whole lot but was surprised by the look and feel of it. It doesn't have fast wireless charging, as each coil only outputs 5W as advertised, but it does what I want. I can put my phone (Samsung Galaxy Note 9) and wireless earbuds (Samsung Galaxy Buds) on it when I go to bed and I have a full charge ready for the next day. I'm pleasantly surprised by this charger!
customer_reviews.author: Benjaguy

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertized
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this charge pad for a month now. I have charged 3 devices simultaneously with no issues. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, practical and life saver:)
customer_reviews.text: This one is life saver. I keep checking for chargers every day. As, I keep on moving between my office bedroom, and living room. It gets difficult to maintain multiple chargers. And it gets only complex as my husband wants to use charger at same time. I leave this one in my living room. Both me and my husband can charge phones at same time with out hassle of wires. This one is really sleek and the leather finish is cherry on top.
customer_reviews.author: Radhika inapakolla

customer_reviews.title: Works great and so much easier and better than a cord!
customer_reviews.text: Placed this in our family room so the kids can put their phone "to bed" at night. No more looking for charging cables, or arguing when someone takes one or loses one. Phones are fully charged when they grab them in the morning. Does what it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Mind of its own.
customer_reviews.text: This does what it wants when it wants it might charge ya phone
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Fleurinor

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: When this first arrived, I was able to get a phone with a case to charge on it if I placed the phone perfectly on the center of the pad. One inch to the left or the right and it would not charge, though. This issue was the same even if I removed the case. After a month, it stopped charging altogether. Missed the return window so now I have a $35 electronic paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Toubia

customer_reviews.title: Power supply
customer_reviews.text: Power supply port is super small. Failed after less than 1 year of use. Unless it is located in a spot where there is 0% chance the power cord will ever be disturbed don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Katko

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth Your Time
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work at all out of the package. It's feels to be made of really cheap synthetic leather. Also is completely rigid so no way to collapse it for ease of use. Skip this product.
customer_reviews.author: Prometheus

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t charge watch
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would charge all my chargeables together (watch, phone, bf’s phone) just by putting them on here, but it has to stay on top of a particular spot and the watch doesn’t work at all on this
customer_reviews.author: Giselita

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working but seller made it right
customer_reviews.text: It was a great product,, but stop working after a couple of months, but the seller contacted and made it right
customer_reviews.author: az

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget
customer_reviews.text: Check compatibility, some reasonably new iPhones can't charge on Qi at all. I was pleased to find my old Samsung S6 was compatible. This is a sleek, low profile product with a leather-like finish. The centers of three charging areas are unobtrusively embossed on top. It looks nice enough to leave in plain sight. Charging rates seem really good, though I haven't benchmarked them against wired charging.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Worked Immediately
customer_reviews.text: Product came just as advertised. I was worried at first because the material felt a little on the weaker side and I was curious how long it would take for my phone to connect to the charger. It connected right away and I had a full charge faster than I would with a plugged in cord. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The pad works great. The only drawback is that there isn't a light/indicator on the pad itself that shows the device on top is connected.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan R Witcraft

customer_reviews.title: Kinda sucks
customer_reviews.text: Didnt charge my smart watch, so if youre looking for something that'll do that, look elsewhere. Also it would randomly overheat sometimes. So much so that my devices wouldnt charge. I ended up throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Zeches

customer_reviews.title: love it! great item
customer_reviews.text: this is so nice if you’re tired of having a million cords in your house! it charges up to 3 compatible devices at once. the only downside is if you like to use your phone while it charges. i’m considering buying more for my household!
customer_reviews.author: letitia katalinic

customer_reviews.title: Was great till it wasn't.
customer_reviews.text: Dead already. Neverdropped or moved. 1st startted glitching then stopped working. Dont waste your money. Choose another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get it..... you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Life changing! I love this and the entire family (3 items) can charge without wires! Plug in and plop your phone on top and BOOM! So easy!
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Simply doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I took it out of the box, plugged it in, attempted to try and charge five different devices. Nothing worked. I'm returning it. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Suspense

customer_reviews.title: Happy buyer!
customer_reviews.text: We love our charging pad - both my husband charge our phones on it and at times we also have one of our kids phones on it. I leave mine on it every night to charge and I feel like my phone battery lasts longer than when I charge it in the regular charger . Very please -Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Theiss

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for me grand daughter, have to make sure it is compatable for the correct phone. will not work with just any phone.
customer_reviews.author: k. witten

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: This product was working exceptionally for 2 months. Charged our phones faster than the original apple charger. However it just stopped working one day. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: lena

product_meta.title: Wireless Charging Pad, ZealSound Qi-Certified Ultra-Slim Triple Wireless Charger Station for Multiple 3 Devices & New Airpods Ultra Slim Leather Mat W/AC Adapter for All Qi Enabled Phones (Black)
feature_bullets: 【Three Charging Unit for Standard Charge】 Charge 3 Qi-Enabled phones simultaneously and can charge the New Airpods;The 5w Standard Charger is better to prolonging your phone's battery life. Not the faster the better. Too fast charge will Shorten battery life of your phone, especially for those phones don't support fast charge itself.

【Charge Forward with AC Adapter】Charge any Qi-compatible device 5% faster thanks to the included 12V/2A AC Adapter, using highly efficient components and an advanced chipset. Note: It does not charge through metal or cases thicker than 4mm.

【Advanced Safety Protection】 Exclusive Multifunctional Intelligent Protect Technology provides temperature control, surge protection, short-circuit prevention, and more. 0.24in thickness design plus intelligent temperature control system ensure cooler but more efficient charging; Leather ultra slim pad and premium copper coil makes the charge safer and has a good heat dissipation.

【Universal Compatibility】Supports wireless charging on QI-ENABLED devices like iPhone 11/iPhone 11 Pro/iPhone 11 Pro Max/iPhone 8/8 plus/X/XS/XR, pixel 3, Galaxy Note 8, Galaxy S20, S8, Samsung S10/S9/ S9 Plus, Galaxy S8 Plus, Galaxy S7/S7 Edge, Galaxy S6/S6 Edge, Nexus 4, Nexus 5, Lumia920, Galaxy Note 10, Note 10 Plus, S10, S10+, S10E, and other Qi-enabled devices.
【What You Get】1 x Wireless Charger Station, 1 x AC Adapter, 1 x User Guide, 1 x Portable Storage Box.
